clusters.name: Refrigerator And Temperature Controlled Cabinet Mode

attributes.name: SupportedModes
attributes.valueRange: At least one entry SHALL include the Auto mode tag
attributes.description: Indicates the supported modes for the device.

attributes.name: CurrentMode
attributes.description: Indicates the current mode of the device.

attributes.name: StartUpMode
attributes.description: Indicates the startup mode of the device.

attributes.name: OnMode
attributes.description: Indicates the on mode of the device.

parameters.description: On receipt of this command, if the NewMode field indicates a valid mode transition within the supported list, the server SHALL set the CurrentMode attribute to the NewMode value.

parameters.valueRange: ActiveAlarms: AlarmBitmap, InactiveAlarms: AlarmBitmap, Mask: AlarmBitmap, NewState: AlarmBitmap
